@EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA https://t.co/w6rSff2sOE

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids We’ve asked you to meet face to face countless times. We’ve asked for action. We’ve called, emailed, protested... only now do you make a statement. I only hope your own family are never subjected to living conditions like this. We are helpless and overwhelmed with the stench.
